ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: What game features would you like to see added?
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/19/2003 10:07:57 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Yes, it would make me VERY happy if they would get rid of that part... the searching for
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/19/2003 10:07:57 PM Eastern Standard Time, dawn_marie@... writes:

I agree with you there. I can see losing the exp, but I hate trying
to find my corpse and get all my gear back. I got slapped last night
by Choon (which conned white to me) so I thought I could kill him.
Died about a minute later and paid heck trying to find my corpse.


Yes, it would make me VERY happy if they would get rid of that part... the searching for the corpse.

Side note though... has anyone noticed that the higher level you are, there is a difference in what cons you can kill? For example, when you start off it's usually not to hard to kill things that con white but as you get up in lvl sometimes even things that con blue can be hard.


"Sail to your heart's desires, and know when to drop anchor."
